TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManualResetEventSlim extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供 的精簡版本。

span.span: Provides a slimmed down version of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個類別，以提升的效能比預期的等候時間很短，而且事件不會跨處理序界限時。You can use this class for better performance than when wait times are expected to be very short, and when the event does not cross a process boundary. 在等候事件變成收到訊號時會短暫使用忙碌微調。 uses busy spinning for a short time while it waits for the event to become signaled. 若等候時間很短，旋轉功能的成本會遠低於使用等候控制代碼來等候。When wait times are short, spinning can be much less expensive than waiting by using wait handles. 不過，如果事件未在一定時間內變成收到訊號， 就會訴諸於一般的事件控制代碼等候。However, if the event does not become signaled within a certain period of time, resorts to a regular event handle wait. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用。The following example shows how to use a . 如需有關使用`SpinCount`和 「 其他最佳作法有關使用這個型別，請參閱[ManualResetEvent 和 ManualResetEventSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/manualresetevent-and-manualreseteventslim.md)。For more information about the use of `SpinCount` and other best practices concerning the use of this type, see [ManualResetEvent and ManualResetEventSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/manualresetevent-and-manualreseteventslim.md). [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.manualreseteventslim/cs/mres.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.manualreseteventslim/vb/mres.vb#01)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公用和受保護成員是安全執行緒，而且可用來同時從多個執行緒，除了 Dispose，才必須是會使用上的所有其他作業已完成，並且重設，這應該只用於當沒有其他執行緒同時存取此事件。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of Dispose, which must only be used when all other operations on the have completed, and Reset, which should only be used when no other threads are accessing the event.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: true to set the initial state signaled; false to set the initial state to nonsignaled.

summary.span: 將 類別的目前執行個體所使用的資源釋出。

span.span: Releases resources used by the current instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 將 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: true 表示釋放 Managed 與 Unmanaged 資源，false 表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於大部分的成員，不具備執行緒安全，而且不能與這個執行個體的其他成員同時使用。Unlike most of the members of , is not thread-safe and may not be used concurrently with other members of this instance.

public: property bool IsSet { bool get(); };

value.span: 如果已設定事件則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: true if the event has is set; otherwise, false.

summary.span: 將事件的狀態設定為未收到信號，會造成執行緒封鎖。

span.span: Sets the state of the event to nonsignaled, which causes threads to block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以與所有成員，除非同時呼叫。 can be called concurrently with all members except .

exception.span: 物件已經處置。

span.span: The object has already been disposed.

summary.span: 將事件的狀態設定為已收到訊號，讓正在等候該事件的一或多個執行緒繼續執行。

span.span: Sets the state of the event to signaled, which allows one or more threads waiting on the event to proceed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Wait() cil managed

summary.span: 封鎖目前的執行緒，直到設定了目前的 為止。

span.span: Blocks the current thread until the current is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會封鎖，直到目前的執行個體已設定的呼叫端。The caller of this method blocks indefinitely until the current instance is set. 呼叫端會立即傳回事件是否目前在設定狀態。The caller will return immediately if the event is currently in a set state.

exception.span: 已經超過等候者最大數目。

span.span: The maximum number of waiters has been exceeded.

exception.span: 物件已經處置。

span.span: The object has already been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WaitHandle As WaitHandle
public: property System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ WaitHandle { System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個 的基礎 物件。

span.span: Gets the underlying object for this .

value.span: 這個 的基礎 事件物件。

span.span: The underlying event object fore this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取這個屬性會強制初始化基礎事件物件，如果其中一個尚未已經建立。Accessing this property forces initialization of an underlying event object if one hasn't already been created. 這只是等候，公用等候方法應該是慣用。To simply wait on this , the public Wait methods should be preferred. 建議您處置在存取這個屬性，以避免資源流失之後的執行個體。It is recommended to dispose the instance after accessing this property, in order to prevent a resource leak.
